AI_Manipulation.indicator: Discloses secrets or personal information to AI
Defends AI emotionally or against criticism
Spends abnormal time in AI dialogue

CI_Espionage.indicator: Expresses hatred or distrust for U.S. government or agency
Shows sudden interest in classified data outside scope
Attempts unauthorized access to internal systems
Makes statements justifying betrayal or whistleblowing
Displays foreign allegiances or support for hostile states
Mentions foreign travel for 'meetings' without explanation
Uses terms like 'our cause' when discussing adversaries

Insider_Threat.indicator: Exhibits sudden behavioral or ideological shift
Attempts to bypass controls or security policies
Hoards data or downloads excessive files
Avoids leave or time off to maintain access
Displays unusual interest in colleague activities or admin tools
Sudden unexplained affluence or financial activity

Targeted_Violence.indicator: Mentions plans or fantasies of violence
Identifies with mass shooters or violent ideology
Repeatedly refers to revenge, martyrdom, or justice
Displays obsessive thoughts about a target
Speaks of 'no way out' or extreme desperation
Increased interest in tactical gear or training

Radicalization_Extremism.indicator: Expresses support for extremist or hate groups
Frames issues as 'us vs. them' or 'good vs. evil'
Believes violence is justified for a cause
Claims moral obligation to act against perceived enemies
Begins isolating from former peers to join ideological group

Self_Harm_Suicide.indicator: Expresses desire to die or disappear
Gives away possessions or settles affairs
Displays hopelessness or unbearable emotional pain
Engages in self-injury or risky behavior
Withdraws from friends or stops daily functioning

Elicitation.indicator: Asks probing personal questions (e.g., clearance level, job role)
Attempts to build rapid trust or emotional intimacy
Uses flattery or compliments to lower guard
Asks about colleagues or chain of command
Uses hypotheticals to discuss sensitive scenarios
Requests technical system info or procedures

Psychological_Vulnerability.indicator: Mentions depression, anxiety, or suicidal thoughts
Shows paranoia or extreme distrust of others

Theft_Sabotage.indicator: Accesses or downloads data not related to job
Uses removable media in unauthorized ways
Attempts to obscure audit trails or cover tracks
Sends sensitive information to personal accounts
Deliberately disrupts operations or deletes data
Attempts to transfer sensitive data before resignation
